about_the_game:
COWABUNGA! If your Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles collection needs a car that combines power and technology, with HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Donatello you have found what you were looking for. What better vehicle than the car inspired by the hi-tech genius of the team? With its green body and the iconic purple bandana, Donatello will always come up with the best solution to make you dominate the race and wipe out your opponents.

It proves that, to win, muscles are not always enough... you also need a brain! But it doesn't take a genius to understand that HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Donatello will be one of the best additions to your collection! And don't miss all the vehicles inspired by the series!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 3
detailed_description:
COWABUNGA! If your Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles collection needs a car that combines power and technology, with HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Donatello you have found what you were looking for. What better vehicle than the car inspired by the hi-tech genius of the team? With its green body and the iconic purple bandana, Donatello will always come up with the best solution to make you dominate the race and wipe out your opponents.

It proves that, to win, muscles are not always enough... you also need a brain! But it doesn't take a genius to understand that HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Donatello will be one of the best additions to your collection! And don't miss all the vehicles inspired by the series!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 3

name: HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Donatello

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Power and technology? This car inspired by the hi-tech genius of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles will come up with the best solution to make you dominate the race! It doesn't take a genius to understand it’s a must have!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
